title: User Interface Designer
description:
We are hiring creative and dynamic individuals to turn our mobile applications and software applications into easy-to-use products for our clients. The primary role will ensure that all elements of the online user experience are optimized for improved usability, usefulness, and exceptional visual design. Other important responsibilities include gathering user requirements, designing graphic elements and building navigation components. To be successful in this role, you should have experience with design software and wireframe tools.

**Roles and Responsibilities**

* Develop UI mockups and prototypes such as navigation menus, search boxes, tabs, and widgets that clearly illustrate how sites function and look like
* Create original graphic designs (e.g. images, sketches and tables)
* Prepare and present rough drafts to internal teams and key stakeholders
* Producing high-quality UX design solutions through wireframes, visual and graphic designs, flow diagrams, storyboards, site maps, and prototypes.
* Testing UI elements such as CTAs, banners, page layouts, page designs, page flows, and target links for landing pages.
* Identify and troubleshoot UX problems (e.g. responsiveness)
* Conduct layout adjustments based on user feedback
* Adhere to style standards on fonts, colors and images

**Pre-requisites**

· A portfolio of professional UI/UX design work for both web and mobile platforms.

· Working knowledge of the following technologies and software: Sketch, InVision, Figma, Visio, HTML, CSS (SCSS), iOS, Android, Design Systems, and Adobe Creative Suite.

· Multi-tasking and time-management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks.

· A portfolio of professional UI/UX design work for both web and mobile platforms.

· BSc in Design, Computer Science or relevant field

**Experience**

2+ Years of experience preferred. Freshers can apply.

title: Product Designer
description:
**UI/UX Designer**

### **Location:** Hyderabad, India

### **Employment Type:** Full-Time; Salaried

### **Compensation:** Base Salary, Bonus, Medical

**Job Description**

**About Us:**

### 
At Innovapptive, we are bringing the industrial front-line worker, back-office and assets together. Our platform is the only patented and “Code-Free” connected worker platform for SAP and IBM Maximo and is disrupting and digitizing archaic, tedious, & labor intensive paper-based processes for maintenance, operations, & supply chain. The industrial front-line workers are empowered with a suite of highly reconfigurable mobile apps, while the back-office has real-time visibility into the front-line workforce with better planning, scheduling, adoption monitoring and actionable insights. Some of the world’s largest brands such as Newmont Mining, Dominion Nuclear, Hess, Shell, UNICEF, ConocoPhillips, Reckitt Benckiser are digitally transforming their back-office and front-line industrial worker experiences. We are saving companies millions of dollars by improving their asset uptime, productivity, safety, and talent challenges, while delivering jobs better, faster, cheaper and safer.

### 
We are backed by Tiger Global Management, a Global Marquee Fund with over $30 Billion of Assets Under Management (AUM). Tiger Global Management has a reputation of investing and building some of the world's "Unicorn" brands such as Spotify, Netflix, Facebook, LinkedIn, Amazon, Peloton, Harry's, Ola, Flipkart, Freshworks and many more!.

### 
Our mission is made possible by Innovapptive’s most important asset: our people. We come together through collaboration and ambition in a team-driven culture. Through the success of our product, we have seen monumental growth in our workforce, and we constantly look for exceptional talent to join us. At Innovapptive, you are challenged with dynamic tasks that drive your professional development and career growth. Join us on our journey to deliver an innovative connected worker experience and to empower 350 Million Industrial Front-Line Workers around the world with the ability to truly harness the power of connected worker experience by improving the working life of a front-line worker and the back-office employee.

**The Role**


UI/UX designer to become part of the vibrant and fast growing design team. You will be responsible for crafting intuitive and user-friendly interfaces for our B2B SaaS products in both mobile & web platforms. From understanding user needs to designing usable solutions, you love owning the product’s experience. If you advocate a user-first approach to achieve the north star and love working closely with cross-functional teams, then this is for you!

**How You Will Make an Impact:**

* Contribute to and maintain a Design System to design products that deliver simple and consistent across products and platforms.
* Collaborate with Engineering teams to ensure smooth hand-off of designs ensuring experience gets translated well into development.
* Represent the voice of the user with objectivity. You collect, analyze and document user requirements, needs, challenges from Senior Designers & Product Owners
* Demonstrate strong UX process to justify every design decision, debate your views, while remaining open to other perspectives
* Create journey maps, process flows and wireframes for design solutions that are intuitive, easy to use.
* Proactively identify and propose improvements to existing design, process and tools

**What will be preferred by us?**

* Having a strong portfolio of UX design work which demonstrates design-thinking, creative problem solving and a user centered design process.
* Past Experience on using and maintaining design systems
* Good to have knowledge of front-end development technologies (HTML, CSS, Mat Angular Design Components, iOS & Android Components) to facilitate collaboration with developers.
* Experience working in the software-as-a-service (SaaS) industry.

**What You Bring to The Team:**

**Ideal Candidate**


The ideal candidate is a highly energetic, passionate, and purpose-driven executive that wants to make a significant impact on the world. The ideal candidate will work in a fast-paced, dynamic, and data-driven organization and is obsessed with performance marketing and search engine optimization.

**Required Qualifications**

* Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
* 2-4 yrs of experience designing for cross platform devices (Android, iOS, windows, mobile, desktop) to deliver consistent experiences.
* Experience with concepts of design tools like Components in Figma, Figjam, Miro, Adobe XD.
* Solid understanding of grid systems, typography, web and mobile interface trends
* Bachelors or Masters degree in design or a related field will be a plus but not mandatory.

**What We Offer above work:**

* Competitive compensation, including stock options
* Exceptional health, vision, and dental care
* A positive, open, and highly-innovative environment and team.
* Entrepreneurial spirit with unlimited opportunity to grow.
* Opportunity to work with leading global brands on exciting and impactful projects.
* Competitive Base Pay.
* Best of plan on Vacation & Paid Time Off.
* Provision of Medical Insurance for family - self, dependent, spouse, dependent children, parents/parent-in-laws.
* Paid Maternity and Paternity leave.
* Bi-annual reviews to ensure transparency and promote high performance culture.
* OKR Driven Performance Development Environment.
* Learning & Development - access to a wide range of e-Learning courses (technical, Product, Process, etc.,).
* A host of Interest Groups/Clubs for Book Reading, Toastmasters, Sports - Cricket, Volleyball, Throw-ball, Badminton, TT, Music.

**Innovapptive does not accept and will not review unsolicited resumes from search firms.**


Innovapptive is an equal opportunity employer and is committed to a diverse and inclusive workplace. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion or creed, alienage or citizenship status, political affiliation, marital or partnership status, age, national origin, ancestry, physical or mental disability, medical condition, veteran status, gender, gender identity, pregnancy, childbirth (or related medical conditions), sex, sexual orientation, sexual and other reproductive health decisions, genetic disorder, genetic predisposition, carrier status, military status, familial status, or domestic violence victim status and any other basis protected under federal, state, or local laws.

title: User Interface Designer
description:
**Job Type:** Full Time
**Job Location:** Ahmedabad
We are looking for a talented Graphics & UI/UX Designer to join our team. In this role, you will leverage your expertise in graphic design, UI/UX design, and print media design to create seamless and engaging experiences for our users. Additionally, you will collaborate closely with project managers and development teams to create intuitive and visually appealing user interfaces for websites and digital products.


#### **Responsibilities:**


* Conduct comprehensive user research, including surveys, to gather insights and understand user needs and preferences
* Translate user insights and requirements into intuitive sitemaps, wireframes, and interactive prototypes that effectively communicate design concepts
* Create visually appealing and engaging user interfaces for websites and digital products, adhering to user-centered design principles and incorporating feedback from users and clients
* Design impactful graphic design elements such as logos, brochures, and social media posts that maintain brand consistency and resonate with the target audience
* Design high-quality print media materials such as brochures, flyers, and packaging, ensuring their effectiveness in communication and user experience
* Collaborate closely with project managers and development teams to ensure the successful implementation of design concepts across all mediums
* Stay abreast of emerging technologies, design tools, and methodologies, and integrate them into the design process to enhance efficiency and productivity
* Develop and maintain design documentation, including design guidelines, specifications, and style guides
* Communicate design processes, ideas, and solutions clearly and effectively to cross-functional teams and clients

#### **Desired Skills:**


* Proven 5+ years of experience as a Graphics & UI/UX Designer or in a similar role with experience in print media design
* Strong understanding of user-centered design principles, usability, and accessibility standards for both digital and print media
* Excellent visual design skills with the ability to create visually appealing and cohesive interfaces and print materials
* Proficiency in industry-standard design tools: Adobe XD, Figma, Photoshop, Illustrator, Sketch, and InDesign
* Ability to conduct thorough user research and translate insights into actionable design solutions
* Collaborative mindset and ability to effectively communicate and collaborate with project managers, developers, and clients
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to identify design issues and devise elegant solutions
* Familiarity with interactive prototyping tools to create high-fidelity prototypes with advanced functionality
* Strong attention to detail and the ability to balance multiple projects and deadlines effectively
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills to articulate design concepts, processes, and solutions clearly to both technical and non-technical clients
* Passion for staying updated with the latest design trends, technologies, and industry advancements in both digital and print media

title: User Experience Researcher
description:
Our Company
  
  

Changing the world through digital experiences is what Adobe’s all about. We give everyone—from emerging artists to global brands—everything they need to design and deliver exceptional digital experiences! We’re passionate about empowering people to create beautiful and powerful images, videos, and apps, and transform how companies interact with customers across every screen.
  
  

We’re on a mission to hire the very best and are committed to creating exceptional employee experiences where everyone is respected and has access to equal opportunity. We realize that new ideas can come from everywhere in the organization, and we know the next big idea could be yours!
  
  

The opportunity
  
On the Design Research & Strategy team, our mission is to lay a user-centered foundation for Adobe product design and development. We are seeking a Senior Experience Researcher to steer research for Adobe Illustrator, from early explorations through shipping new features/products.
  
What we do
  
  

Assess project scope, form appropriate research questions, and identify appropriate research methods (developing new methods if/where needed)
  
  

Runs research studies from start to finish, including developing a realistic research plan and materials, recruiting participants, and synthesizing data into actionable insights.
  
  

Build alliances across the company to identify new partners, drive teamwork, and deeply understand the business context of research problems. We engage with different roles and product teams to understand and influence business goals, system architecture, and product designs.
  
  

Identify new strategic opportunities and initiatives that the product and organization can explore.
  
  

Advocate for the customer by articulating research findings and product ideas through clear and insightful presentations. We often present work in group-wide or company-wide forums (e.g., brown bags, tech summit, MAX, KTB, etc.).
  
  

Mentor junior staff and supervise contractors/vendors on more complicated programs of study.
  
Who we are looking for
  
  

**Requirements:**  

Significant hands-on research experience, with at least 5 years of that experience in an industry setting (e.g. UX/product research, market research, consulting, etc.)
  
  

Able to handle areas (user/product/domain) that may be ambiguous or ill-defined.
  
  

Experience conducting research on new, emerging technologies (e.g. Generative AI).
  
  

A deep understanding of the product life cycle and conducts research in a timely manner to have maximum impact.
  
  

Experience with ethnographic research.
  
  

Strong organizational, planning, and time management skills.
  
  

Can collaborate well across all project roles (design, research, product management, engineering, etc.)
  
  

Goes beyond summarizing study data to identify significant user needs and/or product issues.
  
  

Is comfortable connecting the dots between mixed data types (qualitative, quantitative, analytics) to create deeper and more comprehensive insight narratives.
  
  

Can proactively identify and communicate clear product solutions based on these findings, sometimes across departments.
  
  

Presentations connect to broader business goals and KPIs.
  
  

Experience communicating work at the management, director, and VP levels.
  
  

An undergraduate degree from a 4-year, accredited institution.
  
  

**Nice to haves:**  

Experience researching creative workflows, including desktop apps, mobile apps, and web-based tools.
  
  

Knowledge of graphic design user workflows, pain points, needs, and motivations.
  
  

Interest and experience with GenAI technology & understanding how people want to leverage GenAI
  
  

An advanced degree in HCI or HCDE, or similar field.
  
  

Familiarity with or interest in Adobe’s creative (Photoshop, InDesign, Illustrator).
  
  

Experience with survey development, including building, executing, analyzing.
  
Why you’ll love working here
  
  

Collaborate with and learn from other researchers from a wide range of backgrounds; Psychology, Anthropology, HCI, Computer Science, Design and Management, Linguistics, Consulting, Market Research, and more.
  
  

At Adobe, we value the differences in others’ stories and ideas— You’ll be able to bring your authentic self to work every day.
  
  

We offer a competitive benefits package including; unlimited vacation days, 401k matching, educational reimbursement, wellness dollars, fertility benefits, parental leave, childcare assistance, gender reassignment benefits, and more!
  
  

We’re on a mission to hire the very best and are committed to creating exceptional employee experiences where everyone is respected and has access to equal opportunity. Adobe is committed to providing reasonable accommodations to help you succeed. We’re on a mission to hire the very best and are committed to creating exceptional employee experiences where everyone is respected and has access to equal opportunity. We realize that new ideas can come from everywhere in the organization, and we know the next big idea could be yours!
  
About Adobe Design
  
Adobe Design creates tools that amplify the world’s ability to create and communicate. We’re a global team of designers, researchers, prototypers, content strategists, program managers, and more who work across Adobe’s three product lines: Creative Cloud, Document Cloud, and Experience Cloud.
  
  

Adobe is proud to be an Equal Employment Opportunity and affirmative action employer. We do not discriminate based on gender, race or color, ethnicity or national origin, age, disability, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, veteran status, or any other applicable characteristics protected by law. Learn more.
  
  

Adobe aims to make Adobe.com accessible to any and all users. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation to navigate our website or complete the application process, email accommodations@adobe.com or call (408) 536-3015.
  
  

Adobe values a free and open marketplace for all employees and has policies in place to ensure that we do not enter into illegal agreements with other companies to not recruit or hire each other’s employees.

title: User Experience Researcher
description:
Senior UX Researcher - Microsoft Digital Studio


Location: Hyderabad or Bangalore, India


Overview


Are you passionate about creating user-centric digital experiences that empower people and organizations? Do you enjoy conducting both quantitative and qualitative user research and translating insights into design solutions? If so, you might be the Senior UX Researcher Microsoft Digital Studio is looking for.


Microsoft Digital Studio is a global team of designers, researchers, data scientists, and strategists who collaborate to create innovative digital products and services for Microsoft and its customers. We are looking for a Senior UX Researcher to join our Hyderabad or Bangalore studio and lead user research projects where you will be helping to drive digital innovation at enterprise scale, including exciting new spaces like AI.


#MSD  

#MSDJOBS  

#MDEE  

#MDEEJOBS  

#DPGJOBS

**Responsibilities**
--------------------


Responsibilities

* Plan, design, and conduct user research activities such as quantitative surveys, usability tests, diary studies, and interviews.
* Partner closely with key stakeholders across design, engineering, data science, and leadership to establish trust and deliver actionable insights in a fast-paced, rapidly changing environment.
* Analyze and synthesize both quantitative and qualitative user data and insights to inform design decisions and strategy.
* Communicate and present research findings and recommendations to diverse stakeholders, including product teams, senior management, and external clients.
* Mentor and coach junior researchers and designers on user research methods and best practices.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define and deliver user-centric digital solutions that meet user needs and business goals.

**Qualifications**
------------------


Qualifications

* An MA/MS degree or higher in Human-Computer Interaction, Psychology, Sociology, or a related field or a BA/BS related to one of the above fields with significant academic or industry experience.
* At least 5 years of experience in conducting user research for digital products and services, preferably in an agency or consultancy setting.
* Proficiency in a variety of user research methods and tools, such as qualitative and quantitative analysis, remote and in-person testing, prototyping, and data visualization.
* Experience with online survey platforms, such as Qualtrics, Survey Monkey, or Microsoft Forms.
* Excellent communication and presentation skills, both verbal and written.
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with a keen eye for detail and quality.
* A portfolio of user research projects that demonstrate your impact and process.
* Experience working across employee experience tools is a big plus!

 **Location:** We are hiring in the following locations: Bangalore or Hyderabad, India.

  

Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. Consistent with applicable law, all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, citizenship, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, immigration status, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran or military status, race, ethnicity, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable local laws, regulations and ordinances. If you need assistance and/or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the application process, read more about requesting accommodations.

description:

Commerce Cloud, SAP Hybris, Adobe Magento will be and added advantage

**The Opportunity and Key Responsibilities**

* The India Experience Creative Studio is one of Merkle’s Global Experience Design Studios based in Bangalore.
* The Design Crew works on strategic & innovative, crafted experiences for products and services delivering high quality branded creative solutions that are user centric and deeply human.

**As Associate Creative Director, UX,** you will partner with cross-functional team members and work closely with the creative director to create impactful experience design strategies, concepts and solutions for our global clients across digital product transformation, commerce design and service design projects, and add value to our client partners.

* You will lead and own experience design projects spanning from strategy to conception to execution and launch for services and products and manage a team of experience designers (UX/ interaction desigm).
* Actively work with the Studio Lead to hire and build talent for the studio.
* The role is based out of Bangalore and will require close collaboration with Global Teams. We are looking for someone who has an expertise in UX strategy, commerce design, interaction design, process driven user centric design and agile to design for any device and platform.
* You will have a unique blend of creative vision and strategic thinking, to lead our team and will act as a strong creative strategist and a design thought leader.

**Formal design education & portfolio is mandatory along with 15+ years of experience.**

**Skills & Expertise**

* Strong market and user-research and analytical capabilities. Conducting workshops and user studies.
* A user-centric mindset with creative, innovative and analytical approach
* Strong conceptual thinking with the ability to collaborate and provide user-centric design


solutions.

* Deep understanding and practical experience with UX design process and methodologies – user- research, user journey mapping, task-flows, information architecture and wireframing.
* Prior experience with commerce and service design.
* Good team building skills and ability to mentor a team of skilled design professionals with UX, interaction design and design thinking abilities.
* Great attitude and excellent communication skills (comprehension, verbal and written) to


effectively present concepts, designs, and experience visions + ability to persuade.

* Prior experience working with Global brands and teams is an added advantage.

title: Technical Designer
description:
Introduction  

At IBM, work is more than a job - it's a calling: To build. To design. To code. To consult. To think along with clients and sell. To make markets. To invent. To collaborate. Not just to do something better, but to attempt things you've never thought possible. Are you ready to lead in this new era of technology and solve some of the world's most challenging problems? If so, lets talk.  

  

Your Role and Responsibilities  

* Create user personas, user flows, and wireframes to visualize and communicate design concepts.
* Design intuitive and visually appealing user interfaces for web and mobile applications.
* Develop interactive prototypes to showcase and test design concepts.
* Collaborate with developers to ensure seamless implementation of designs.
* Conduct usability testing to gather feedback and iterate on design improvements.
* Stay updated on industry trends, design principles, and emerging technologies.
* Work closely with marketing and content managers and stakeholders to align designs with business goals.
* Ensure consistency in design elements and user experience across different platforms.

  

Required Technical and Professional Expertise  

* Proficiency in design tools such as Adobe XD, Sketch, Figma, or similar tools.
* Strong understanding of user-centered design principles and usability.
* Experience in creating wireframes, user flows, and interactive prototypes.
* Knowledge of responsive design principles for various devices.
* Ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.
* Excellent communication and presentation skills to convey design concepts.
* Detail-oriented with a focus on delivering high-quality designs.
* Problem-solving skills to address user experience challenges.
* Understanding of web and mobile development processes.

  

Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise  

* Experience with motion design and micro interactions.
* Familiarity with front-end development languages such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
* Knowledge of accessibility standards and inclusive design practices.
* Exposure to user analytics tools for data-driven design decisions.
* Understanding of design systems and component libraries.
* Continuous learning and staying updated on UI/UX trends and best practices.
* Certification or relevant academic background in UX/UI design.
* Collaboration with user researchers for comprehensive design solutions.
* Experience with conducting and analyzing A/B testing for design optimization.

  

About Business UnitIBM Consulting is IBM’s consulting and global professional services business, with market leading capabilities in business and technology transformation. With deep expertise in many industries, we offer strategy, experience, technology, and operations services to many of the most innovative and valuable companies in the world. Our people are focused on accelerating our clients’ businesses through the power of collaboration. We believe in the power of technology responsibly used to help people, partners and the planet.  

This job requires you to be fully COVID-19 vaccinated prior to your start date and proof of vaccination status will be required before your start date. During the Onboarding process you will be asked to confirm your vaccination status, in case you are unable to get vaccinated for any reason, you can let us know at that stage. Please let us know if you are unable to be vaccinated due to medical or religious reasons. IBM will consider such requests on a case by case basis subject to submission of required proof by the candidate before a stipulated date.  

Your Life @ IBMIn a world where technology never stands still, we understand that, dedication to our clients success, innovation that matters, and trust and personal responsibility in all our relationships, lives in what we do as IBMers as we strive to be the catalyst that makes the world work better.
Being an IBMer means you’ll be able to learn and develop yourself and your career, you’ll be encouraged to be courageous and experiment everyday, all whilst having continuous trust and support in an environment where everyone can thrive whatever their personal or professional background.


Our IBMers are growth minded, always staying curious, open to feedback and learning new information and skills to constantly transform themselves and our company. They are trusted to provide on-going feedback to help other IBMers grow, as well as collaborate with colleagues keeping in mind a team focused approach to include different perspectives to drive exceptional outcomes for our customers. The courage our IBMers have to make critical decisions everyday is essential to IBM becoming the catalyst for progress, always embracing challenges with resources they have to hand, a can-do attitude and always striving for an outcome focused approach within everything that they do.


Are you ready to be an IBMer?

  

About IBMIBM’s greatest invention is the IBMer. We believe that through the application of intelligence, reason and science, we can improve business, society and the human condition, bringing the power of an open hybrid cloud and AI strategy to life for our clients and partners around the world.Restlessly reinventing since 1911, we are not only one of the largest corporate organizations in the world, we’re also one of the biggest technology and consulting employers, with many of the Fortune 50 companies relying on the IBM Cloud to run their business. At IBM, we pride ourselves on being an early adopter of artificial intelligence, quantum computing and blockchain. Now it’s time for you to join us on our journey to being a responsible technology innovator and a force for good in the world.  

  

Location StatementWhen applying to jobs of your interest, we recommend that you do so for those that match your experience and expertise. Our recruiters advise that you apply to not more than 3 roles in a year for the best candidate experience.  

  

For additional information about location requirements, please discuss with the recruiter following submission of your application.  

  

Being You @ IBMIBM is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal-opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, caste, genetics, pregnancy, disability, neurodivergence, age, veteran status, or other characteristics. IBM is also committed to compliance with all fair employment practices regarding citizenship and immigration status.

title: User Experience Researcher
description:
Senior Mixed Methods UX Researcher - Microsoft Digital Studio


Location: Hyderabad or Bangalore, India


Overview


Are you passionate about creating user-centric digital experiences that empower people and organizations? Do you enjoy conducting both quantitative and qualitative user research and translating insights into design solutions? If so, you might be the Senior UX Researcher Microsoft Digital Studio is looking for.


Microsoft Digital Studio is a global team of designers, researchers, data scientists, and strategists who collaborate to create innovative digital products and services for Microsoft and its customers. We are looking for a Senior UX Researcher to join our Hyderabad or Bangalore studio and lead user research projects across various domains and platforms, including M365 Copilot (Microsoft’s AI offering) and our Hybrid Work Research portfolio.


#MSD  

#MSDJOBS  

#MDEE  

#MDEEJOBS  

#DPGJOBS

**Responsibilities**
--------------------


Responsibilities

* Plan, design, and conduct user research activities such as quantitative surveys, usability tests, diary studies, and interviews.
* Partner closely with key stakeholders across design, engineering, data science, and leadership to establish trust and deliver actionable insights in a fast-paced, rapidly changing environment.
* Analyze and synthesize both quantitative and qualitative user data and insights to inform design decisions and strategy.
* Communicate and present research findings and recommendations to diverse stakeholders, including product teams, senior management, and external clients.
* Mentor and coach junior researchers and designers on user research methods and best practices.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define and deliver user-centric digital solutions that meet user needs and business goals.

**Qualifications**
------------------


Qualifications

* An MA/MS degree or higher in Human-Computer Interaction, Psychology, Sociology, or a related field or a BA/BS related to one of the above fields with significant academic or industry experience.
* At least 5 years of experience in conducting user research for digital products and services, preferably in an agency or consultancy setting.
* Proficiency in a variety of user research methods and tools, such as qualitative and quantitative analysis, remote and in-person testing, prototyping, and data visualization.
* Experience with online survey platforms, such as Qualtrics, Survey Monkey, or Microsoft Forms.
* Excellent communication and presentation skills, both verbal and written.
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with a keen eye for detail and quality.
* A portfolio of user research projects that demonstrate your impact and process.

 **Location:** We are hiring in the following locations: Bangalore or Hyderabad, India.

  


Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. Consistent with applicable law, all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, citizenship, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, immigration status, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran or military status, race, ethnicity, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable local laws, regulations and ordinances. If you need assistance and/or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the application process, read more about requesting accommodations.

title: Product Designer
description:
**Job Description**

We are seeking a creative and innovative Product Designer proficient in the latest tools and processes in the field and with a strong skill set in animation and interactive design. The successful candidate will design aesthetically pleasing and highly usable interfaces that align with our business objectives and enhance the user experience.

**Key Responsibilities**

1. Design intuitive, engaging, and seamless user interfaces for digital platforms, incorporating interactive and animated elements.

2. Translate complex business requirements into effective digital experiences using design and animation.

3. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand user needs, identify design opportunities, and create meaningful user experiences.

4. Conduct usability testing and incorporate user feedback to ensure designs meet user needs and drive customer satisfaction.

5. Stay up-to-date with design application updates, industry trends, and emerging technologies to deliver innovative design solutions.

6. Produce high-quality design solutions through wireframes, visual and graphic designs, flow diagrams, storyboards, site maps, and prototypes.

7. Advocate for the user throughout the development process and work closely with development teams to ensure the design vision is maintained, understood, and implemented.

8. Participate in design critiques, presenting design work and providing feedback to teammates in a thoughtful, constructive, and collaborative manner.

**Qualifications**

1. Should have 2-4yrs of experience

2. Proven experience as a UI/UX Designer with a strong portfolio that demonstrates your animation and interactive design skills.

3. Proficiency in design software (e.g., Figma, Sketch, Adobe Creative Suite) and knowledge of HTML/CSS and animation tools.

4. Knowledge of the latest UI/UX design trends and interactive technologies.

5. Strong understanding of usability and user-centred design principles.

6. Excellent problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and a strong aesthetic sensibility.

7. Excellent communication and collaboration skills.

8. Experience conducting user research and usability testing.

9. Ability to handle multiple projects concurrently and meet deadlines.

We thank all applicants for their interest in this opportunity, however, only those selected for an interview will be contacted. Growhut is committed to creating an inclusive workplace that reflects the diversity of our community. We encourage applicants from diverse backgrounds, including Indigenous applicants, all genders, nationalities and persons with disabilities.

title: User Interface Designer
description:
**Job Title: UI/UX Designer**

**Job Description:**

We are seeking an experienced and talented Senior UI/UX Designer to join our team. In this role, you will lead the UI/UX design efforts for our digital products and collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to create exceptional user experiences. This position offers an exciting opportunity for a seasoned designer to make a significant impact and contribute to the growth and success of our organization.

**Responsibilities:**

* Lead the end-to-end UI/UX design process for web and mobile applications, from concept ideation to final execution.
* Assist in the creation of wireframes, prototypes, and user flows to effectively communicate design ideas.
* Develop high-fidelity prototypes and interactive mockups to communicate design concepts and interactions effectively.
* Collaborate with product managers, engineers, and other stakeholders to define project requirements and prioritize design initiatives.
* Conduct user research, usability testing, and data analysis to gather insights and inform design decisions.
* Establish and maintain design systems, style guides, and UI component libraries to ensure consistency and scalability across projects.
* Mentor and provide guidance to junior designers, fostering their growth and development in the UI/UX field.
* Stay abreast of industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices in UI/UX design, and incorporate them into our design processes.
* Advocate for user-centered design principles and advocate for the importance of UX throughout the organization.

**Requirements:**

* Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design, Interaction Design, HCI, or related field.
* 3-5 years of professional experience in UI/UX design, with a proven track record of delivering successful digital products.
* Strong portfolio showcasing a range of UI/UX projects, including web and mobile applications.
* Solid understanding of user-centered design principles, usability testing methodologies, and design thinking processes.
* Excellent communication, collaboration, and presentation skills, with the ability to articulate design decisions and rationale effectively.
* Experience working in an Agile development environment and collaborating with cross-functional teams.
* Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail, with a passion for creating intuitive and visually appealing user experiences.
* Proficiency in design tools such as Adobe XD, Sketch, Figma, or similar.

title: Product Designer
description:
**Product Designer**


**Chennai - India**

  

As a Staff Product Designer, you are a seasoned strategic Individual Contributor (IC) with a wealth of experience in delivering products that are both usable and desirable. You are a systems-thinker, able to grasp entire customer experiences and workflows. Leveraging human-centered design techniques, you skillfully identify and pursue opportunities for product enhancements. You are a trusted collaborator, effectively partnering with stakeholders and cross-functional leaders to shape and articulate the strategy and vision for your designated area.

  

Thriving in the face of large, complex problem spaces, you excel in providing clarity and alignment to teams. You're at ease with ambiguity and adept at working independently throughout the design process. Yet, you also embrace collaboration and regularly mentoring fellow designers, contributing to the growth and development of the design organization. Beyond your role with designers, you champion the discipline of design within the company, confidently discussing not only your work but also the broader impact of design on both the business and our customers' experiences.

 **Your Impact:**


* Clarify the business context of design work
* Lead end-to-end experiences spanning multiple teams
* Break large projects down to incremental units of value
* Recruit and hire a product design team
* Leverage experience to mentor and grow a design team
* Gather customer insight across the ecosystem
* Contribute to product vision and align stakeholders.

  


**What You Bring to the Table:**


* 5-10 years experience as an individual contributor
* 2+ years experience in a leadership or management role in product design
* Strong user experience and user interface design skills
* Proficiency in agile design processes and strategies
* Experience building, implementing and scaling design systems
* A proven track record of delivering products to customers
* Experience designing responsive web applications
* Exceptional verbal and written communication skills
* A benefit mindset that values the interdependencies across people and teams

  


**Desirable Assets:**


* Experience designing marketing technology or other B2B software
* Experience in UX research and analysis
* Experience with DesignOps
* Experience recruiting and hiring designers
* Front-end development experience

  


**About Vendasta:**



So what do we actually do? We create an entire platform full of digital products & solutions that help small to medium sized businesses (SMBs) have a stronger presence online through digital advertising, online listings, reputation management, website creation, social media marketing … and much more! Our platform is used exclusively by channel partners, who sell products and services to SMBs, allowing them to leverage us to scale and grow their business. We’re trusted by 65,000+ channel partners, serving over 5.5 million small to medium businesses worldwide!

 **Perks:**


* Benefits - Health insurance
* Paid time offs
* Training & Career Development - Professional development plans, leadership workshops, mentorship programs, and more!
* Free Snacks, hot beverages, and catered lunches on Fridays
* Culture - comprised of our core values: Drive, Innovation, Respect, and Agility
* Provident Fund

title: User Interface Designer
description:
**Responsibilities:**

**1. User Requirements Analysis:**

- Collaborate with product managers and engineers to thoroughly understand and evaluate user requirements for app UI redesign.

**2. Conceptualization and Design:**

- Develop innovative design concepts, illustrating ideas through storyboards, process flows, and sitemaps.

**3. Visual Design Enhancement:**

- Redesign graphic user interface elements, screens, including menus, tabs, widgets, and personalized icons, to elevate the app's visual appeal.

**4. Prototyping and Mockups:**

- Develop UI mockups and prototypes that clearly demonstrate the enhanced functionality and aesthetics of the redesigned app.

**5. Feedback Integration:**

- Present design drafts to internal teams and key stakeholders, gather feedback, and refine designs accordingly.

**6. Problem Solving and Continuous Improvement:**

- Identify and address UX issues, conduct layout adjustments based on user feedback, and ensure ongoing improvements in the app's user interface.

**Requirements/Skills:**

**1. UI/UX Design Expertise:**

- Proven work experience as a UI/UX Designer with a strong portfolio showcasing successful redesign projects.

**2. Wireframing Tools Proficiency:**

- Familiarity with wireframe tools (e.g., Wireframe.cc or Whimsical or other) for efficient communication of design concepts.

**3. Design Software Mastery:**

- Up-to-date knowledge of design software like Figma or Adobe XD for creating visually appealing and functional UI designs.

**4. Communication and Collaboration:**

- Strong team spirit and excellent communication skills to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and stakeholders.

**5. Time Management:**

- Exceptional time-management skills to meet project deadlines and deliver high-quality designs.

**6. Problem-Solving Skills:**

- Ability to think creatively and strategically to solve design challenges and enhance user satisfaction.

title: Senior User Experience Designer
description:
**Hungry, Humble, Honest, with Heart.****The Opportunity**As part of the Global Design organization, the design team is seeking a strong Sr. UX designer for our Bangalore, India office. We are looking for someone who is recognized for their design leadership and known for their domain expertise. The successful candidate is someone who is passionate about solving complex problems, is excited by the opportunity to work with a globally distributed design team and can help grow and connect design projects across Nutanix worldwide offices.  

**Engineering / R&D at Nutanix**"Design" and "Customer delight" are embedded into every step of our product cycle. Nutanix, has a design first philosophy that brings consumer-grade design and web-scale engineering together to create an amazing user experience that has only been seen in the consumer world with the likes of Apple and Tesla. Visit our career page to know more about life at Nutanix.  

**Your Role*** Digest problems with high complexity and propose simple, elegant and innovative design solutions.
* Challenge status quo with attention to detail on UX strategy, implementation and micro-interactions
* Has demonstrated an ability to execute, and drive, a variety of design-related activities.
* Facilitate design sprints, workshops and brainstorming sessions
* Motivate and drive consensus across multiple functions (PM, Engineering & Design)
* Define the direction of our flagship product’s design as a part of a multidisciplinary team
* Work with UI development and backend engineering teams to ensure effective execution of designs.
* Compare and contrast feature experience journeys with competing products and influence feature direction in a particular product area.
* Generate customer insights and influence feature direction.
* Own product experience journey for one or more domains within the product.
* Estimate the technical feasibility/ implications of designs and propose solutions leading to convergence.
* Identify gaps/inefficiencies in the design process and contribute to improvements.
* Actively influence decisions on products and solutions through design
Present and communicate design work to all stakeholders, execs and broader teams  
* 

**What You Will Bring****Required skill-set:*** Strong design portfolio demonstrating innovation, craftsmanship and leadership
* A natural leader & passionate designer who can guide multiple designs and team members
* A solid understanding of at least one product domain and developing a good reputation within a company in that domain.
* Work effectively in a fast-moving environment, juggle multiple projects, and prioritize work
* Strong working knowledge of the latest wire-framing/ design and prototyping tools
* Familiar with usability testing (in person and remote), user research, contextual inquiry, interviews, qualitative design analysis, research reporting and design thinking
* Strong written and verbal communication skills
* Able to work cooperatively and communicate effectively
* Stay current on technology trends to inform and inspire modern design.

**Preferred skills:*** Strong interest in data visualization and enterprise software.
* Have working knowledge of accessibility guidelines and best practices.
* HTML5, JavaScript, and CSS3 knowledge, current on the latest responsive design techniques.

**Minimum requirements:*** Bachelor’s degree or advanced degrees (Masters, PhD, etc.) in Design, Interaction design, HCI, or related field with 8+ years experience in enterprise or consumer.
* Experience in the enterprise product industry is preferred.
Passion for design, telling customer stories, and simplifying complex problems  
* 

**About the Team*****About Your Manager:**** Your manager for this role is Shyama Sundar Duriseti, the Technical Director of Design.
* Shyama has extensive experience in designing product experiences and shaping the careers of designers in both enterprise and consumer domains.
* He is the founding designer of one of Nutanix's flagship products and has helped it grow into the 2nd largest revenue generator for the company.

***What The Team Says:**** Shyama is often acknowledged by his team and peers as a calm, focused, and fun-to-work-with designer and leader.
* He is adept at leading teams through challenging requirements and stakeholders to deliver simple, elegant, and innovative solutions.

***How We Work:**** The team works in a hybrid work environment, providing flexibility for collaboration and individual work.
